violatedPolicies.name: Fixable Severity at least Important
violatedPolicies.description: Alert on deployments with fixable vulnerabilities with a Severity Rating at least Important
violation: Fixable CVE-2024-45590 (CVSS 7.5) (severity Important) found in component 'body-parser' (version 1.20.2), resolved by version 1.20.3
violatedPolicies.remediation: Use your package manager to update to a fixed version in future builds or speak with your security team to mitigate the vulnerabilities.

violatedPolicies.name: Docker CIS 4.1: Ensure That a User for the Container Has Been Created
violatedPolicies.description: Containers should run as a non-root user
violatedPolicies.remediation: Ensure that the Dockerfile for each container switches from the root user

violatedPolicies.name: Ubuntu Package Manager in Image
violatedPolicies.description: Alert on deployments with components of the Debian/Ubuntu package management system in the image.
violatedPolicies.remediation: Run `dpkg -r --force-all apt apt-get && dpkg -r --force-all debconf dpkg` in the image build for production containers.
